The Rule of Law in Afghanistan

Wednesday, July 1 | 11:00am - 12:15pm

Join USIP and the World Justice Project for an in-depth conversation on the “The Rule of Law in Afghanistan: Key Findings 2019” report findings, as well as crucial factors for the rule of law in Afghanistan. Panelists will also discuss how the report can encourage data-driven policy choices and guide program development to strengthen the rule of law.
